name: Alice Object File
summary: Learn about .A2C files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Alice can import several 3D file formats, including .DWG, .DXF, .ASE, and .AI files. However, these files must be converted to the A2C format in order to be edited with Alice.

description: 3D model used by Alice, a 3D programming environment designed for educational purposes; saved in a compressed 3D mesh format can include vertices, edges, and polygons; may be viewed and edited as a three-dimensional object within Alice.
